verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> be unto the pastors <S%H7462><s%> that destroy <S%H6><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of my pasture! <S%H4830><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the pastors <S%H7462><s%> that feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people; <S%H5971><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> have scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H853><s%> my flock, <S%H6629><s%> and driven them away, <S%H5080><s%> and have not <S%H3808><s%> visited <S%H6485><s%> them: behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will visit <S%H6485><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H853><s%> the evil <S%H7455><s%> of your doings, <S%H4611><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> will gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H853><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of my flock <S%H6629><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have driven <S%H5080><s%> them, and will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> their folds; <S%H5116><s%> and they shall be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and increase. <S%H7235><s%>

And I will set up <S%H6965><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them which shall feed <S%H7462><s%> them: and they shall fear <S%H3372><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more, <S%H5750><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> be dismayed, <S%H2865><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they be lacking, <S%H6485><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I will raise <S%H6965><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> a righteous <S%H6662><s%> Branch, <S%H6780><s%> and a King <S%H4428><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> and prosper, <S%H7919><s%> and shall execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and justice <S%H6666><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In his days <S%H3117><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be saved, <S%H3467><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> safely: <S%H983><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> he shall be called, <S%H7121><s%> THE LORD <S%H3068><s%> OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS. <S%H6664><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

But, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> led <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%> country, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> and from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I had driven <S%H5080><s%> them; and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> their own land. <S%H127><s%>

Mine heart <S%H3820><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me is broken <S%H7665><s%> because of the prophets; <S%H5030><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> shake; <S%H7363><s%> I am <S%H1961><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and like a man <S%H1397><s%> whom wine <S%H3196><s%> hath overcome, <S%H5674><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of his holiness. <S%H6944><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of adulterers; <S%H5003><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of swearing <S%H423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> mourneth; <S%H56><s%> the pleasant places <S%H4999><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> are dried up, <S%H3001><s%> and their course <S%H4794><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> and their force <S%H1369><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> right. <S%H3651><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> are profane; <S%H2610><s%> yea, <S%H1571><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> have I found <S%H4672><s%> their wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto them as slippery <S%H2519><s%> ways in the darkness: <S%H653><s%> they shall be driven on, <S%H1760><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> therein: for <S%H3588><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, even the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation, <S%H6486><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And I have seen <S%H7200><s%> folly <S%H8604><s%> in the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Samaria; <S%H8111><s%> they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in Baal, <S%H1168><s%> and caused <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to err. <S%H8582><s%>

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> also in the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a horrible thing: <S%H8186><s%> they commit adultery, <S%H5003><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> in lies: <S%H8267><s%> they strengthen <S%H2388><s%> also the hands <S%H3027><s%> of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> that none <S%H1115><s%> <S%H376><s%> doth return <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7451><s%> they are <S%H1961><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them unto me as Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof as Gomorrah. <S%H6017><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the prophets; <S%H5030><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will feed <S%H398><s%> them with wormwood, <S%H3939><s%> and make them drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of gall: <S%H7219><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is profaneness <S%H2613><s%> gone forth <S%H3318><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> Hearken <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H408><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto you: they make you vain: <S%H1891><s%> <S%H853><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of their own heart, <S%H3820><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> out of the mouth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

They say still <S%H559><s%> <S%H559><s%> unto them that despise <S%H5006><s%> me, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath said, <S%H1696><s%> Ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> peace; <S%H7965><s%> and they say <S%H559><s%> unto every one <S%H3605><s%> that walketh <S%H1980><s%> after the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of his own heart, <S%H3820><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> hath stood <S%H5975><s%> in the counsel <S%H5475><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and hath perceived <S%H7200><s%> and heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> his word? <S%H1697><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> hath marked <S%H7181><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> and heard <S%H8085><s%> it?

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a whirlwind <S%H5591><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%> in fury, <S%H2534><s%> even a grievous <S%H2342><s%> whirlwind: <S%H5591><s%> it shall fall grievously <S%H2342><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

The anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he have executed, <S%H6213><s%> and till <S%H5704><s%> he have performed <S%H6965><s%> the thoughts <S%H4209><s%> of his heart: <S%H3820><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall consider <S%H995><s%> it perfectly. <S%H998><s%>

I have not <S%H3808><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> these prophets, <S%H5030><s%> yet they <S%H1992><s%> ran: <S%H7323><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> spoken <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> them, yet they <S%H1992><s%> prophesied. <S%H5012><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> they had stood <S%H5975><s%> in my counsel, <S%H5475><s%> and had caused <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> my words, <S%H1697><s%> then they should have turned <S%H7725><s%> them from their evil <S%H7451><s%> way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> and from the evil <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7455><s%> of their doings. <S%H4611><s%>
Am I <S%H589><s%> a God <S%H430><s%> at hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7138><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> a God <S%H430><s%> afar off? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%>

Can <S%H518><s%> any <S%H376><s%> hide himself <S%H5641><s%> in secret places <S%H4565><s%> that I <S%H589><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> him? saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> Do not <S%H3808><s%> I <S%H589><s%> fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth? <S%H776><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I have dreamed, <S%H2492><s%> I have dreamed. <S%H2492><s%>

How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall this be <S%H3426><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> lies? <S%H8267><s%> yea, they are prophets <S%H5030><s%> of the deceit <S%H8649><s%> of their own heart; <S%H3820><s%>

Which think <S%H2803><s%> to cause <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> to forget <S%H7911><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> by their dreams <S%H2472><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they tell <S%H5608><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> as <S%H834><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> for Baal. <S%H1168><s%>

The prophet <S%H5030><s%> that <S%H834><s%> <S%H854><s%> hath a dream, <S%H2472><s%> let him tell <S%H5608><s%> a dream; <S%H2472><s%> and he that <S%H834><s%> <S%H854><s%> hath my word, <S%H1697><s%> let him speak <S%H1696><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> faithfully. <S%H571><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is the chaff <S%H8401><s%> to <S%H854><s%> the wheat? <S%H1250><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Is not <S%H3808><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> like <S%H3541><s%> as a fire? <S%H784><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and like a hammer <S%H6360><s%> that breaketh <S%H6327><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%> in pieces?

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that steal <S%H1589><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that use <S%H3947><s%> their tongues, <S%H3956><s%> and say, <S%H5001><s%> He saith. <S%H5002><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> them that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> dreams, <S%H2472><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and do tell <S%H5608><s%> them, and cause <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> to err <S%H8582><s%> by their lies, <S%H8267><s%> and by their lightness; <S%H6350><s%> yet I <S%H595><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them not, <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them: therefore they shall not <S%H3808><s%> profit this people at all, <S%H3276><s%> <S%H3276><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H2088><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a priest, <S%H3548><s%> shall ask <S%H7592><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> thou shalt then say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, <S%H853><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> burden? <S%H4853><s%> I will even forsake <S%H5203><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And as for the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the people, <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I will even punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H5921><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye say <S%H559><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and every one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered? <S%H6030><s%> and, What <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoken? <S%H1696><s%>

And the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall ye mention <S%H2142><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more: <S%H5750><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his burden; <S%H4853><s%> for ye have perverted <S%H2015><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> thee? and, What <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoken? <S%H1696><s%>

But since <S%H518><s%> ye say, <S%H559><s%> The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and I have sent <S%H7971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I, even I, will utterly forget <S%H5382><s%> <S%H5382><s%> you, and I will forsake <S%H5203><s%> you, and the city <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> you and your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and cast you out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my presence: <S%H6440><s%>

And I will bring <S%H5414><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> shame, <S%H3640><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be forgotten. <S%H7911><s%>
